name: hangover
content:
hangover noun [C]
(ILLNESS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a feeling of illness after drinking too much alcohol: have a hangover I had a terrible hangover the next morning. a hangover cure See also
hungover

hangover noun [C]
(CONTINUING)
something that continues from an earlier time: hangover from The present political system is a hangover from the colonial era.
